=== About Me ===

My namne is Gustav Lundin and I live in the city of Sala, Sweden. I started to use Ubuntu 2010 and my first expression was that I hated it. But I didn't loved Windows either so I gave it a second chance and now I use Ubuntu as my primary operative system on nearby all my computers. I am a computer geek, who is also interested in graphic design and open source contribution.

Since 2012, I work (as volunteer) to establish the Open Source Museum at SÃ¤tra Brunn, outside Sala. It will use open source technology to visualise and present digital content, it will open in 2015!
